name: TamilBible

skdetail:

Invocation Name: tamil bible
des: Listen to Tamil Bible. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
